item.description:
After months of training, we are finally coming up to the 5K road race. For a "practice" run to learn route we will meeting at the town hall.

5k Walk/Run Road Race Fundraiser PRACTICE RUN!
Monday, September 28th
Meet at 6pm

Braintree Town Hall
One JFK Memorial Drive
Braintree, MA 02184

Meeting Place: In front of the town hall, where the statues are.

Event Fees: Org Team and Annual Members - None. Members and Guests: $2

Organizer(s): Julie & Amanda

Min/Max: There is no minimum. Attendance is unlimited.
Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by 3pm on Monday September 28th.



Inclement Weather: it will not rain this day, but just in case... check by 4pm on the 28th
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Posted on the registration form under "files"
item.how_to_find_us: we will meet by the statues in front of the town hall

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 5K training "practice run"
